# cloudlab_vlan (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cloudlab_vlan" "my-cloudlab-vlan" {
  name        = "vlan-name"
  subnet_mask = "255.255.255.0"
}
```

- `subnet_mask` (String)
